com.exlibris.dps.repository.plugin.virusChcek

Interface VirusCheckPlugin


  • public interface VirusCheckPlugin
    Interface for virus check plugin type. The plugin scans files for viruses
    This plugin interface supports both java and script implementation. For more information please refer to the User Guide.
    Author:
    shaib

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      java.lang.String getOutput() 
      boolean isVirusFree() 
      void scan(java.lang.String fileFullPath)
      Scans a given file for viruses.

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        void scan(java.lang.String fileFullPath)
        Scans a given file for viruses.
        Parameters:
        fileFullPath - The full path to the file

      • getOutput

        java.lang.String getOutput()
        Returns:
        An output message indicating the outcome of the virus check

      • getAgent

        java.lang.String getAgent()
        Returns:
        The agent of the plugin type

      • isVirusFree

        boolean isVirusFree()
        Returns:
        true if the file is virus free, false otherwise.
